thread.title: Ferne McCann finds her dream man on Celebs Go Dating until he reveals STRIPPER past: “Are you f g joking?”
thread.title_full: Ferne McCann finds her dream man on Celebs Go Dating until he reveals STRIPPER past: “Are you f g joking?”

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Ferne McCann finds her dream man on Celebs Go Dating until he reveals STRIPPER past: “Are you f g joking?”
text:
Ferne McCann thought she’d met her dream date on Celebs Go Dating tonight. 
That is until she found out he works as a STRIPPER. 
“Now we’re talking fresh meat… now we’re talking,” she said as the long-haired hunk sat down at her speed dating table. 
The pair chatted and Ferne learnt her prospective date was both a soldier and an aspiring model. 
“Could he be any more perfect?” she said. Ferne McCann finds her dream date on Celebs Go Dating (Photo: E4) 
But things quickly turned sour when the Essex babe learnt he had another occupation – as a stripper. 
“Are you f g joking?” she said. 
Then speaking to the camera, she insisted: “I don’t want to go out with a stripper.” But things didn't go to plan (Photo: E4) 
Will then proceeded to describe in detail how he stripped completely naked to entertain punters. 
He admitted: “I handcuff, I blindfold and gag girls and hang them off the stage.” 
But while Ferne looked completely horrified – she did decide to give him a chance. 
“He was my man, he excited me,” she told Nadia Essex. “I’m buzzing about my date with Will.” Will was a stripper (Photo: E4) 
The pair met for cocktails but they didn’t completely see eye to eye. 
And then Will dropped the real bombshell – he’d already gone on a date with Jorgie Porter. 
“I can’t believe I’m getting Jorgie’s sloppy seconds,” Ferne complained. 
And she left the date early – so she’s still looking for love. 
* Celebs Go Dating continues weeknights at 10pm on E4. Like us on Facebook
